Html:
Hi! This tool seems very promising, especially for users of Latex.

After adding style sheets to the word (on MAC) I was able to get a proper numerical citation (IEEE style). However, when I try to add bibliography, the menu still offers only 4 in-built styles from Word. Using any of them changes the citation style in text as well to match the chosen bibliography style.

Is there any solution for this?

 

Thanks
It's a bug in Word for Mac. See http://bibword.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Styles_FAQ&referringTitle=Documentation#Q2 for a solution.
